data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: While scrolling, the GIF plays at an inconsistent speed (pauses randomly, skips frames, etc)
data.expected_result: It should still be playing smoothly. Alternatively, the GIF could eventually pause until you stop scrolling
data.short_description: [May not happen on PCs with powerful graphics] Scrolling through the chat while a GIF is playing will cause the GIF to play at an inconsistent speed
data.steps_to_repro: - Post a GIF in a channel with a long message history - send another 10 messages in the channel so the GIF is not at the bottom - while the GIF is playing, scroll through the chat and observe the GIF
